mapper.select: select parent.os os , parent.version version , max(case when parent.env = 'dev' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'dev_path' , max(case when parent.env = 'preprd' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'preprd_path' , max(case when parent.env = 'prd' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end) 'prd_path' from ( select RANK() OVER (PARTITION by version, os, env ORDER BY mdfy_date desc) as rm , os , version , file_name , env from app_mykt ) parent where parent.rm = 1 group by version, os order by version desc, os desc limit 10;
